column2: ${username}! May your day continue to shine with happiness and positivity. Until we meet again!

column3: your presence brings joy to my virtual existence. Keep spreading that happiness. Goodbye for now!
carry the memories of the wonderful moments we've shared. Goodbye

column2: Autobot ${username}. Our journey together has been filled with happiness. Keep that spirit alive wherever you go. Goodbye!

column3: your resilience inspires me. As we part ways for now
column4: remember to stay strong and keep spreading that happiness. Goodbye!
